### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    notification_type VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    is_active BOOLEAN,
    last_update TIMESTAMP
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE notifications SET notification_type = 'Alert' WHERE notification_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    message VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);


CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50)
);


CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE notifications SET message='New message', timestamp=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id=100
